data.title: As AI wipes jobs, Google CEO Sundar Pichai says it's up to everyday people to adapt accordingly: 'We will have to work through societal disruption' | Fortune
data.description: AI isn’t just coming for entry-level workers—Google’s CEO Sundar Pichai says no job, not even his own, is safe. But those who don’t adapt will be the first to fall.
data.author: Emma Burleigh
